titleStmt.title: Manuductions to the pallace of trueth by F.B. Obseruant
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Bonaventure.

notesStmt.note: In the Approbation, the author is referred to as "P.F. Bonaventurae Britanno"; misinterpretations of this phrase have caused the work to be wrongly ascribed to Richard Britton and to Richard Francis Britton; "Britton" also is wrongly described as Jackson's pseudonym--Halkett & Laing (3rd ed.) M30.
Includes an errata leaf at end.
Identified as STC 3804a in reel guide.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakepeare Library.
